abstract.t: RFC 5988 [RFC5988] defined the way of indicating resources on the Web. This specification defines link relation type that may be used to express the relationships between a resource and associated actions that may be performed against context resource.Editorial Note (To be removed by RFC Editor) Distribution of this document is unlimited.
